text:
@Yamiche @jonathanvswan Here it is

Jonathan Swan on with @AriMelber now

Donald Trump is going to cut back holding these press briefings

Decision made...coincidentally...a day after @realDonaldTrump suggested people taking disinfectants to cure the Coronavirus

He’s in retreat

#TheBeat #inners #MSNBC
